column1: An epic fantasy quest to recover an ancient magic scepter from a tyrant king in his Dark Tower
brought to life in electronic form.<br/><br/>To vanquish the usurper
players search the four realms of the circular game board for three keys to unlock the tower's gate.  On this journey
there are battles to be fought against roving bands of brigands
plague and hunger.  There are bazaars to visit to purchase supplies and assistants for the quest.  There are uncharted territories to ge...
Dark Tower: A Fantasy Adventure Born Of Electronic Wizardry
